title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: wall.createComment
methods.description: Adds a comment to a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: Group ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the comment.

parameters.name: reply_to_comment
parameters.description: ID of comment to reply.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of media objects attached to the comment, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media ojbect: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media owner. '<media_id>' - Media ID. For example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

parameters.name: sticker_id
parameters.description: Sticker ID.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Unique identifier to avoid repeated comments.

methods.name: wall.delete

methods.name: wall.deleteComment

parameters.name: post_id

parameters.name: comment_id

methods.name: wall.edit
methods.description: Edits a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the post.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media application owner. '<media_id>' - Media application ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614", May contain a link to an external page to include in the post. Example: "photo66748_265827614,http://habrahabr.ru", "NOTE: If more than one link is being attached, an error is thrown."

parameters.name: topic_id
parameters.description: Topic ID. Allowed values can be obtained from newsfeed.getPostTopics method

methods.name: wall.editAdsStealth
methods.description: Allows to edit hidden post.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID. Used for publishing of scheduled and suggested posts.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the post.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, 'page' - wiki-page, 'note' - note, 'poll' - poll, 'album' - photo album, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media application owner. '<media_id>' - Media application ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614", May contain a link to an external page to include in the post. Example: "photo66748_265827614,http://habrahabr.ru", "NOTE: If more than one link is being attached, an error will be thrown."

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: Only for posts in communities with 'from_group' set to '1': '1' - post will be signed with the name of the posting user, '0' - post will not be signed (default)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographical latitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -90 to 90).

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Geographical longitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -180 to 180).

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: ID of the location where the user was tagged.

parameters.name: link_button
parameters.description: Link button ID

parameters.name: link_title
parameters.description: Link title

parameters.name: link_image
parameters.description: Link image url

parameters.name: link_video
parameters.description: Link video ID in format "<owner_id>_<media_id>"

methods.name: wall.editComment
methods.description: Edits a comment on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: New comment text.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: List of objects attached to the comment, in the following format: , "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media attachment owner. '<media_id>' - Media attachment ID. For example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

methods.name: wall.get
methods.description: Returns a list of posts on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: User or community short address.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of posts.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of posts to return (maximum 100).

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return 'wall', 'profiles', and 'groups' fields, '0' - to return no additional fields (default)

methods.name: wall.getById
methods.description: Returns a list of posts from user or community walls by their IDs.

parameters.name: posts
parameters.description: User or community IDs and post IDs, separated by underscores. Use a negative value to designate a community ID. Example: "93388_21539,93388_20904,2943_4276,-1_1"

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return user and community objects needed to display posts, '0' - no additional fields are returned (default)

parameters.name: copy_history_depth
parameters.description: Sets the number of parent elements to include in the array 'copy_history' that is returned if the post is a repost from another wall.

methods.name: wall.getComment
methods.description: Returns a comment on a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

methods.name: wall.getComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments on a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: need_likes
parameters.description: '1' - to return the 'likes' field, '0' - not to return the 'likes' field (default)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of comments.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return (maximum 100).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: 'asc' - chronological, 'desc' - reverse chronological

parameters.name: preview_length
parameters.description: Number of characters at which to truncate comments when previewed. By default, '90'. Specify '0' if you do not want to truncate comments.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: thread_items_count
parameters.description: Count items in threads.

methods.name: wall.getReposts
methods.description: Returns information about reposts of a post on user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. By default, current user ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of reposts.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of reposts to return.

methods.name: wall.pin
methods.description: Pins the post on wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall. By default, current user ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

methods.name: wall.post
methods.description: Adds a new post on a user wall or community wall. Can also be used to publish suggested or scheduled posts.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: friends_only
parameters.description: '1' - post will be available to friends only, '0' - post will be available to all users (default)

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: For a community: '1' - post will be published by the community, '0' - post will be published by the user (default)

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: (Required if 'attachments' is not set.) Text of the post.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, 'page' - wiki-page, 'note' - note, 'poll' - poll, 'album' - photo album, '<owner_id>' - ID of the media application owner. '<media_id>' - Media application ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614", May contain a link to an external page to include in the post. Example: "photo66748_265827614,http://habrahabr.ru", "NOTE: If more than one link is being attached, an error will be thrown."

parameters.name: services
parameters.description: List of services or websites the update will be exported to, if the user has so requested. Sample values: 'twitter', 'facebook'.

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: Only for posts in communities with 'from_group' set to '1': '1' - post will be signed with the name of the posting user, '0' - post will not be signed (default)

parameters.name: publish_date
parameters.description: Publication date (in Unix time). If used, posting will be delayed until the set time.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographical latitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -90 to 90).

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Geographical longitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -180 to 180).

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: ID of the location where the user was tagged.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID. Used for publishing of scheduled and suggested posts.

methods.name: wall.reportComment
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a comment on a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

methods.name: wall.reportPost
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

methods.name: wall.repost
methods.description: Reposts (copies) an object to a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: ID of the object to be reposted on the wall. Example: "wall66748_3675"

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Comment to be added along with the reposted object.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Target community ID when reposting to a community.

methods.name: wall.restore
methods.description: Restores a post deleted from a user wall or community wall.

parameters.description: User ID or community ID from whose wall the post was deleted. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: ID of the post to be restored.

methods.name: wall.restoreComment

parameters.name: owner_id

methods.name: wall.search

parameters.name: query

parameters.name: offset
